title: Textile, 1900–74
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: plain weave with continuous and discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade)
description: Two lengths of woven fabric sewn together with silver and gold patterns on red ground. Field covered with stripes patterned by toothed or dove-tailed triangles. Bordered on all sides by geometric pattern and features "tumpal" motif (row of isosceles traingles) at sides.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1900–74.Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: plain weave with continuous and discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade). 1974-9-9.
